member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Round(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Rounds a value to the nearest integer. If the value is midway between two integers then it is rounded up.
member.returns: The integer to the nearest integer value.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.RoundToInt(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Rounds a value to the nearest integer. If the value is midway between two integers then it is rounded up.
member.returns: The integer to the nearest integer value as an .

member.summary: Returns the largest integral value that is less than or equal to .
member.returns: The largest integral value that is less than or equal to .

member.summary: Returns the largest integral value that is less than or equal to .
member.returns: The largest integral value that is less than or equal to as an .

member.returns: The smallest integral value that is greater than or equal to .

member.summary: Returns the smallest integral value that is greater than or equal to .

member.summary: Returns the larger of two numbers.
member.param: The first of two numbers to compare.
The second of two numbers to compare.

member.summary: Returns the smaller of two numbers.

The second of two numbers to compare.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Min(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed[])
member.summary: Returns the smaller of supplied numbers.
member.returns: Whichever one of is the smallest.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Max(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed[])
member.summary: Returns the largest of supplied numbers.

The second of the two values to sort.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Sin(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Returns the sine of the specified angle.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Cos(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Returns the cosine of the specified angle.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Tan(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Returns the tangent of the specified angle.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Asin(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose sine is the specified number.
member.param: A number representing a sine, where d must be greater than or equal to -1, but less than or equal to 1.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Acos(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose cosine is the specified number.
member.param: A number representing a cosine, where d must be greater than or equal to -1, but less than or equal to 1.
member.returns: An angle, θ, measured in radians.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Atan(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose tangent is the specified number.
member.returns: An angle, θ, measured in radians.

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Log2(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.remarks: Implementation based off of Clay. S. Turner's fast binary logarithm

member.name: M:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedMath.Atan2(Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@,Industry.Simulation.Math.Fixed@)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose tangent is the quotient of two specified numbers.
member.returns: An angle, θ, measured in radians.

member.name: T:Industry.Simulation.Math.FixedVector2
